quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru
quotes.quote: At the dawn of history, India started on her unending quest, and trackless centuries are filled with her striving and the grandeur of her successes and her failures.

quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi
quotes.quote: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.

quotes.author: Bal Gangadhar Tilak
quotes.quote: Swaraj is my birthright, and I shall have it.

quotes.author: Sarojini Naidu
quotes.quote: A country's greatness lies in its undying ideals of love and sacrifice that inspire the mothers of the race.

quotes.author: Subhas Chandra Bose
quotes.quote: Freedom is not given, it is taken.

quotes.author: Bhagat Singh
quotes.quote: The sanctity of law can be maintained only so long as it is the expression of the will of the people.

quotes.author: B. R. Ambedkar
quotes.quote: We are Indians, firstly and lastly.

quotes.author: Dr. Rajendra Prasad
quotes.quote: In attaining our ideals, our means should be as pure as the end.

quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru
quotes.quote: A moment comes, which comes but rarely in history, when we step out from the old to the new, when an age ends, and when the soul of a nation, long suppressed, finds utterance.

quotes.author: Chandra Shekhar Azad
quotes.quote: If yet your blood does not rage, then it is water that flows in your veins.

quotes.author: Subhas Chandra Bose
quotes.quote: Forget not that the grossest crime is to compromise with injustice and wrong.

quotes.author: Bal Gangadhar Tilak
quotes.quote: Life is all about a card game. Choosing the right cards is not in our hand, but playing well with the cards in hand determines our success.

quotes.author: Subhas Chandra Bose
quotes.quote: No real change in history has ever been achieved by discussions.

quotes.author: Bhagat Singh
quotes.quote: They may kill me, but they cannot kill my ideas. They can crush my body, but they will not be able to crush my spirit.

quotes.author: Vallabhbhai Patel
quotes.quote: Faith is of no evil in absence of strength. Faith and strength, both are essential to accomplish any great work.

quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi
quotes.quote: You must be the change you wish to see in the world.

quotes.author: Dr. A. P. J. Abdul Kalam
quotes.quote: In this world, fear has no place. Only strength respects strength.

quotes.author: Swami Vivekananda
quotes.quote: Let new India arise out of peasantsâ€™ cottage, grasping the plough, out of huts, cobbler and sweeper.

quotes.author: Ram Prasad Bismil
quotes.quote: Even if I have to face death a thousand times for the sake of my Motherland, I shall not be sorry. Oh Lord! Grant me a hundred births in Bharat. But grant me this, too, that each time I may give up my life in the service of the Motherland.

quotes.author: Jawaharlal Nehru
quotes.quote: We end today a period of ill fortune, and India discovers herself again.
